quotes.text: Talent is a pursued interest, anything you are willing to practice, you can do.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.text: Hard times create strong men, strong men create good times, good times create weak men, and weak men create hard times.
quotes.author: G. Michael Hopf

quotes.text: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste a lot of it.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: Become who you are, by learning who you are.
quotes.author: Pindar

quotes.text: Ideas are like fish, you don’t make fish, you catch fish.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.text: Stress doesn't come from hard work. Stress primarily comes from not taking action over something that you can have some control over.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.text: If you don’t have what you like, you better like what you have.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Art is never finished, only abandoned.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Make visible what, without you, might perhaps never have been seen.
quotes.author: Robert Bresson

quotes.text: I think if you do something and it turns out pretty good, then you should go do something else wonderful, not dwell on it for too long. Just figure out what's next.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Focus is about saying no.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: You can only connect the dots in the rearview mirror, you have to have faith going forward.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.text: Standards are a moving target.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Surprises are the joy of life.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: You don't build it for yourself. You know what the people want, and you build it for them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: If you've got one foot in tomorrow and one foot in yesterday, you'll piss on today.
quotes.author: Debbie Novotny

quotes.text: It is better to under-promise and over-deliver than to over-promise and under-deliver
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.text: Early to bed and early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Well done is better than well said.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Haste makes waste.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Tell me and I forget, teach me and I may remember, involve me and I learn.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Knowing is not enough; we must apply.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Learning never exhausts the mind.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Good ideas are always crazy until they're not.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: Wisdom is the daughter of experience.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Learning never exhausts the mind.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: There are three classes of people: those who see, those who see when they are shown, those who do not see.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Persistence is very important. You should not give up unless you are forced to give up.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: I cannot teach anybody anything. I can only make them think.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: There is only one good, knowledge, and one evil, ignorance.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Strong minds discuss ideas, average minds discuss events, weak minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Wonder is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: To find yourself, think for yourself.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Three may keep a secret, if two of them are dead.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Never ruin an apology with an excuse.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: We are all born ignorant, but one must work hard to remain stupid.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: I didn't fail the test, I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: An investment in knowledge always pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Lost time is never found again.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: If you live each day as it was your last, someday you'll most certainly be right.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Not all those who wander are lost.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
